name: Crate Storm
description:
Ever wonder where all the gaming loot grates come from?

Try to push all the crates to the right side of the room, Survive!

Code, 3d models, other stuff - Gonçalo Monteiro

Music & SFX - Pedro Pimenta aka Jump/Error

Leave your best score in the comments!

Update: Web version is having problems, I've disabled it for now. Downloadable should now have less problems with anti-virus and stuff.
